author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: وَ اَختِمُ القَولَ بقَولِه تعالی:  "وَ مَنْ يَعْشُ عن ذِکْرِ الرَّحمَنِ  نُقَيِّضْ لَهُ شَيطَاناً فَهُوَ لَهُ قَرينٌ."  " وَ مَنْ اَعرَضَ عَنْ ذِکْرِی فإنَّ لَهُ مَعِيشَةً ضَنْکاً."
translation: We conclude Our argument with His words—exalted is He—“And whoso shall withdraw from the remembrance of the Merciful, We will chain a Satan unto him, and he shall be his fast companion.” “And whoso turneth away from My remembrance, truly his shall be a life of misery.”
